title: Gangotri
occurrences: The birth place of the sacred Ganges Gangotri! it's in the Himalayas.

What' is it? Simhadri hit Gangotri with a stone.
Really? Where is Gangotri now?
Gangotri, what happened? Who hit you, tell me."
"Because this gate tripped her, our Gangotri fell down. So we trash it."

Alright. From this moment on... This moment on... I love Gangotri.
I love you, Gangotri!"
